column1: length ball, angling down the leg side, and guided past short fine leg's right! Easy pickings
fixes his line. Length ball, outside off but angling in. Fended off the back foot to mid-on for a quick single
length ball, on leg stump, and tapped towards point for a quick single. They hesitate for the single as the fielder swoops in before breaking the stumps. Rohit, though, was comfortably in
full, wide outside off, and swinging further away. Drives well, but finds cover point
punched! Length ball, outside off, and hammered past cover's right! Becomes T20I cricket's highest run-scorer

given lbw, but Rohit reviews! Slower ball, full outside off but seaming in. Rohit's deceived by the lack of pace and is through his defensive shot early. Ball hits his back leg and the umpire raises his fingers swiftly for the lbw. Rohit discusses with Dhawan before choosing to review. Replays show that the ball is clipping middle stump, so it's 'umpire's call' on the wicket and therefore Rohit must walk back. India retain their review though
full on off, and angling away. Tapped towards cover
full, rolls his fingers over this ball. Lands on middle, and pushed back past the bowler
full, on leg, and he uses his feet to meet the ball. Crunched back to the bowler
length ball on leg stump, and he comes down the wicket again to tap it past the non-striker
full on middle, and flicked off his pads to midwicket for a quick single
full, on middle, and he caresses a drive, but straight to mid-off
angling into his pads, and he swivels before flicking to deep backward square
back of a length, on leg stump, and flicked off his hips to deep backward square leg
length ball, outside off, and he walks towards the ball before crunching a square cut to the point boundary
length ball outside off, and he checks an attempted drive. Ball rolls away to cover
back of a length on middle. Walks across the stumps and fended back
through him! Fullish, outside off, and he presses forward to drive. But the ball goes between the bat-body gap, and into the keeper's gloves
back of a length, on leg stump, with the pace taken off. Dhawan defends it into his body, before the ball rolls away. They scamper across for one with the bowler looking to attempt a run-out
full, on off stump. Looks to defend, but the ball hits his outside edge before rolling away to third man
back of a length, on middle stump. Another slower ball. Dhawan knocks it down with soft hands and calls towards Rahul for a quick single
back of a length, on off stump. Rahul stays on the back foot before defending it away
nearly chopped on! Length ball, outside off, and he shapes up to cut but the ball stays low. Under-edged towards Mushfiqur
full, angling in, and worked off his pads to the leg side for a quick single
back of a length, on leg stump. He rides the bounce before turning it behind square for a jogging single
extra bounce this time! Back of a length outside off, and Dhawan wants to flay this over point, but can't make any connection
inside-edged! Full, outside off, and he prepares to drive, but it takes an edge onto his pads
back of a length, outside off, and he muscles a cut in front of square. Fielded by cover, but can't stop the single
fullish, outside leg stump. Guided with soft hands to the leg side before they scamper across for one
full, outside off, and the attempted square drive flies off his outside edge to the backward point boundary for four. Much needed for India
full, on off, and flicked to midwicket. Minimal footwork from Rahul
length ball, outside off, and punched square to cover point
length ball, on off, and angling in. Bends his knees and then uses his wrists to successfully flick a shot off his hips over square leg for a boundary. Sight for sore eyes
full, on off, and he goes leg-side once again. Lifts a shot off his toes, but it lands short of the fielder at deep midwicket
back of a length on off, cramping Dhawan for space. Comes down the wicket but mistimes it back to the bowler. Dhawan coming down the wicket to create some pace
full, on his toes, and worked off his boot to deep backward square leg. End of Powerplay: 35 for 1
full outside off from around the wicket. Turning in, and driven to cover
half-tracker, wide outside off, and Dhawan tries to attack. Flat-bats a shot to midwicket

soft dismissal! Length ball, outside off and turning away. Rahul looks to cut but it hits the bat near the bottom half. Eventually, he checks the shot, and it lobs in the air for a simple catch at short cover
full outside off, and his attempted drive is sliced over point. Lands short of the fielder in the deep
arm ball, angling into his pads. Worked off his legs to deep backward square
going, going, gone! Full, outside off and turning away. Iyer gets to the pitch of the ball and then beautifully lifts a six over wide long off to end the over on a high
full, outside off and angling further away. Driven to deep extra cover
full, outside off, and he's through his drive too early. Mistimed to cover
length ball, outside off, and tapped to point for a quick single
played fine! Length ball, on his hips, and simply uses his wrists to play a deft shot between keeper and short fine leg
full on off, and tapped away to the vacant region near deep point
length ball, outside off, and he sticks his bat out to guide a shot to point
full, on off, and he tries to work it leg-side but a leading edge very nearly carries to cover. Dhawan lucky!

full toss on off, and he slices an attempted slog over the bowler's head. Lands well short of long-off. Iyer will consider himself lucky since it wasn't called no-ball for height. Could've been out there
good length, outside off, and he mistimes a cut
full, on leg stump. Flicked to square leg, and stopped by Fizz by diving
full, outside off. Tapped away to cover
clobbered! Length on off, and he plants his front leg towards the pitch of the ball before hammering a shot over the bowler's head! Take that
slower ball, full outside leg stump. Worked away to deep backward square
length ball, outside off, and punched to cover for a quick run
length ball, outside off, and nudged past the non-striker to long on for a single
back of a length, on middle, and pulled along the ground to deep midwicket
finds the gap! Full toss, seaming into his toes, and he drills a whipped shot between wide long on and deep midwicket
length ball, outside off, and cut sharply to deep point. Looked like four, but the fielder does well to intercept
length ball outside off and spinning in, cuts it towards deep point

fuller outside off and Iyer goes aerial once again, the ball was spinning away from him and takes the toe end of the bat, Naim at long-off settles under it to take it comfortably. Aminul has his second
dropped short, Dhawan goes for the pull but doesn't get the timing right, also hits it towards deep midwicket, only a single
length ball on middle and spinning on to the pads, flicked away behind square leg, off the mark
fuller outside off, comes forward and drives it wide of long-on
length ball outside off, goes back and punches but cannot beat the man at short cover
fuller on the off, pushed it towards short midwicket
down the ground but Afif shortens his length, pushed towards short extra cover
fuller outside off, reaches out and drives it towards deep cover
fuller on the stumps, nudged towards long-on
length ball outside off, pushes it on the off side but cover fielder cuts it off
a bit of confusion there, Dhawan nudges the length ball towards the right of extra cover and sets off, Pant is unmoved and Dhawan had to retrace his steps. All safe in the end though
length ball, flatter outside off, pushed towards covers
fuller on the stumps, played gently towards midwicket
short and Dhawan latches on to it, goes back and pulls it between deep midwicket and deep square leg for a much-needed boundary
length outside off, punched towards sweeper cover
length ball on the pads, nudges it towards short midwicket, the bowler himself does the fielding. Pant was thinking of a second but there's only one there
short and pulled again, this time straight towards deep midwicket
down the track but Afif saw him coming and shortened his length, Dhawan loses his shape as he looks to force it on the off side, a single in front of square leg off the inner half
a touch fuller outside off, Pant comes forward to block but gets beaten as it spins away
fuller around off, stays alongside the line of the ball and blocks
fuller outside off, looks to push towards long-off, doesn't middle and the ball dribbles towards the bowler
length ball on the stumps, pushed towards midwicket from the back foot
length outside off, too close to cut but Dhawan goes for it, cannot beat the man at cover-point though
fuller outside off, the ball rolls towards cover off the outer half, played with softer hands too
launched over long-on! Down the track, almost to the pitch of the ball and extends his arms, clears the fielder easily
reverse sweep this time but straight towards short third man, was a full ball around off
Mahmudullah fires it wide outside off anticipating Dhawan coming down the track, Dhawan stays in his crease and gets a wide
fuller this time, pushed towards midwicket

length ball on the pads, Pant plays it gently towards midwicket, they complete the first run quickly, Pant calls for the second and Dhawan responds, but then Pant changes his mind realising it's impossible for him to make it. Mahmudullah himself chases the ball, puts in the slide and throws it to the keeper. Dhawan tries to get back but is well short as Mushfiqur breaks the stumps
fuller around off, comes forward and defends
pitched up on the stumps, clears his front leg and drives it towards long-on
fuller on the stumps, looks to drill down the ground but fails to middle, a single towards square leg off the inner half
short and some room outside off, cuts it hard, the sweeper cover puts in the slide and reaches there but cannot stop the ball
fuller on the stumps, nudged around midwicket, once again looks for the second but this time makes an early call to send his partner back

Afif has plucked one out here, one-handed over his head. Was a length ball on the stumps, Dube looked to work it on the leg side but the ball stopped at him and popped over the bowler's head who timed his jump to take it with his right hand
length ball around off, moves towards the bowler and taps it towards midwicket, scampers back for the second
length outside off, Pant stands tall and punches it behind point, opening the face of the bat to find the gap
length ball angling in, looks to flick it on the leg side, misses and gets hit on the thigh
a slower one outside off, Pant looks to hoick it over midwicket but gets beaten as the ball hardly bounces
length outside off, opens the face of the bat to steer it towards third man
another cutter, length outside off, guides it towards third man to get off the mark
starts with a slower one on the pads, clipped away behind square leg
short one, a slower bouncer on middle and leg, Pant swivels and helps it over the wicketkeeper, just lobbing it over than pulling actually
down the track but gets bamboozled by the legcutter, was too early into the shot, looking to hit it towards midwicket
length ball, this one is bowled at full pace and Pant is late on the pull, a single to midwicket
another slower one, way down the leg side, Krunal just chips it in the air, was early into the shot but luckily for him it lands well short of deep midwicket
length ball on the pads, looks to flick it away but misses, collects a leg bye
length ball outside off, pulled towards deep square leg, Pant wants the second, has to put in the dive. The throw is not at the top of the stumps, would have been close had Mushfiqur collected it
length ball on the stumps, Pant looks to loft it over long-on, doesn't get the required power behind it and an easy catch for Naim, his second of the day
length ball on the stumps, pulls it towards deep midwicket
short and wide outside off, uses the pace of the bowler and cuts it between short third man and point
slower one, fuller on the stumps, pushed towards mid-off
slower one but Washington is ready for it, transfer the weight back and pulls it over wide long-on. Neat connection, clears the boundary with ease
length ball on the stumps, goes for the pull but misses, collects a leg bye
length ball down the leg side, misses the flick, gets hit on the thigh, another leg bye
length ball on the pads, drags the pull down towards fine leg
a touch fuller on the stumps and Washington just chips it over mid-off and it just keeps sailing, hits the boundary hoarding on the full
length ball at the body, loses his shape on the pull, a single to midwicket
short, on the leg stump and Krunal finds the maximum this time, pulls it in the air, giving it his all. Over deep midwicket boundary
full, outside off, and swinging away. Meets the ball off the front foot and drives through the covers. Fielder gives it a big chase
length ball on middle, and worked off his hips. Finds the gap past midwicket, and this is running away for four. Silence all around the Kotla
full, nearly a yorker on middle, but dug away to deep midwicket
length ball on leg stump, and he rocks back before guiding a shot to deep backward square leg. Gets off the mark on debut

soft dismissal! Length ball, swinging away and Liton checks a cut. Hits the toe-end of his bat and lobs into the hands of the fielder at cover point. Liton caught in two minds and pays the price for it
full and wide outside off. Lands beyond the tram-lines
length ball on middle and leg. Tries to work it leg-side but it hits his thigh-pad instead
full, around the wicket outside off. Tapped away to cover
length ball, outside off, and he flat-bats a grounded pull to long on
length ball, outside off, and he makes room to cut. But ends up flat-batting a shot past the bowler's right to long off
flighted, full on leg stump, nearly a yorker. Dug back
flighted, length ball outside off, and he flays a cut between cover and cover point. Chahal gives the ball a chase and brings it back smartly
full, outside off, and inviting him to slog. Goes for the big leg-side heave but misses altogether
length ball, on leg stump. Angling into his pads, and whipped to deep midwicket
full, on leg stump. Goes for a flick, but leading edge takes it down to third man instead
slower, full on middle. Naim goes onto the back foot before tapping it with soft hands. Early call for a single
full, outside off and seaming away. Looks to drive but he's nowhere near the ball. Mistimed towards the off side
length ball on middle, and shaping in. Tries to defend, but inside-edged onto his pad. Sharp bowling from DC
full, on middle, and swinging into the left-hander again. Looks to play the on-drive, but inside-edged onto his pads once more
full on middle, and defended away to the off side. They scamper across for one

full, on middle, and nudged off his toes to midwicket for a single. Dube hits the stumps at the bowler's end, and the ricochet allows the batsmen to pinch the second run as well. Ball was near Washington, but he was slow to react. Smart from the Bangladesh duo
good length on middle, and tries to guide it leg-side but it hits his pad instead. Ball rolls away to short third man
length ball, outside off, and he smacks a cut straight to point
full, outside off, and driven with the turn to long off

appeal for lbw + caught but not given. Full on middle, and it hits his pads before lobbing in the air. Rohit, at first slip, dives forward to take the catch but the umpire isn't interested. Ball would've angled down the leg side and neither did it hit the bat
full, on leg stump, and nonchalantly flicked over deep midwicket! On his toes, and punished. A breather for Naim too, who was collecting a lot of dot balls
length ball, on off, and he tries to defend off the back foot, but the ball stays low. Defended away
length ball on middle. Seaming away, and flat-batted past midwicket to cow corner. A couple more
length ball on middle, and punched to cover off the back foot
full, outside of, and he presses forward to time a cover drive extremely well. Finds the gap between mid-off and cover, and the fielders don't even bother chasing
back of a length on middle, and the slower bouncer goes over his bat. Tries to pull but through the shot too early
reverse slog sweep for a maximum! Full, on off, and he switches his grip before hammering a shot over third man! Well executed
full, on off, and tapped to the off side for a quick single. Pant gives it a chase but can't effect the run out
length ball, on middle. Makes room and flat-bats it down to long on
length ball, on off, and turning away. Flies off his blade to the off side for a single
edged past first slip! Length ball outside off and turning away. Tries to cut, but it flies past Rohit to the third-man boundary. Sundar leaking runs
length ball, outside off, and he bends his knees to cut. Rolls away to cover. End of Powerplay: 45 for 1
length ball, outside off, and he walks down the wicket before clattering a front-foot cut to the cover boundary
back of a length on off, and he misses the pull. Ball through to Pant
length ball, outside off, and Soumya misses the pull again. Ball goes through to the keeper
slower ball, on middle, and going down the leg side. Sarkar misses the flick but Bangladesh collect the wide
full, on middle stump. Tapped down to long on for a walking single
offcutter, length ball on off. He swivels and places a grounded pull-shot to deep backward square
full, on off, and tapped to cover for a quick single. Rohit dives and throws to effect a run-out but can't get a direct hit
full, outside off, and he walks across the line before smacking a shot to cow corner
full, outside off, and the googly turns further away. Tries to drive and misses out
full, outside off, and turning away once again. Naim nowhere near the shot
full, on middle stump. Taps the googly back to Chahal

slogged and taken at long on! Celebrates with the thigh-five too. Length ball on middle, and he goes for a big shot trying to clear the leg side, but it's flown off the bat's edge and Gabbar makes no mistake. Chahal is super pumped too!
full on middle, and driven with soft hands to Krunal at cover
full, on middle. And flicked to the leg side
length ball, on leg stump. Worked off his pads to square leg
full, on off stump. Defended back with soft hands
reverse swept over short third man! Full, on off, and he was quick to get into position
full, on off stump. Big stride forward to defend
length ball, outside off, and he makes room to cut a shot to the sweeper fielder
what a ball! Perfect legbreak delivery. Full outside off and turning away. Through to the keeper

length ball on leg stump, and Mushfiqur tries to play it leg-side. Hits his pad and rolls away and he wants a single. Pant, noticing that, runs across to try and effect a run-out but he can't hit the stumps
full, on leg stump. Looks to play leg-side, but it hits his front pad again. Huge appeal for lbw but not given. This was closer, but India don't review. Mushfiqur would've been out had India reviewed
length ball on off, pushing the batsman onto his back foot. Tapped back to Chahal
full on middle, and the googly turns into his pad. Hits his front leg before rolling away to short fine leg

length ball on off, and he tries to fend, but the ball goes under his bat. Pant holds on and appeals for a caught behind but the umpire says 'not out'. Chahal isn't convinced, but Pant asks Rohit to review. Replays suggest no edge, and that's a wasted review. Not out
flatter on the stumps, backs away and defends it towards extra cover
length outside off, worked towards backward point with the spin for a quick single
falls short off long-on. Down the track, Krunal shortens and bowls wide outside off, Soumya reaches for it, but cannot middle it. Falls well short off the in coming long-on
fuller on the stumps and swept away firmly behind square leg, gets four
length ball on the stumps, pushed to the right of the bowler who moves swiftly to prevent the single
length ball outside off, goes back and cuts it towards deep cover
a top edge but clears short fine leg easily, was a length ball on middle and leg and Mushfiqur pulled out another sweep, for another four
length ball on middle and leg, nudged towards short midwicket for a quick single
down the track but Chahal has thrown it wide outside off, Soumya looks to go aerial down the ground, the ball takes the outside edge and dribbles towards the right of short third man
fuller this time, digs it out towards long-on for a couple
slower through the air at 79.3kph, length outside off, comes forward to defend but gets beaten by the spin
fuller around off and middle, flicked away towards midwicket
length ball outside off, spinning in, cuts it towards backward point for one
short and wide, cuts it firmly but cannot beat the man at point
backs away but the bowler follows him, pushed towards point for one
too full outside off, squeezes it out towards third man
length ball outside off, grip and turn to beat the forward push
flatter and straying down the leg side, pulls it towards backward square leg. Washington gets away with it
fuller and wider outside off, smashed through extra cover, Dube at long-off makes a tumbling stop near the boundary, lets it through but the ball stops just inside
a full toss on the stumps, slogged away towards deep midwicket, on the bounce to the fielder
tossed up on the stumps, goes down the track but is not up to the pitch of the ball, gets it from the toe end, on the bounce to Dube at long-on
down the track, Krunal has bowled it wide outside off but Soumya reaches there and drags it way over deep midwicket
fuller and wider outside off, hits it towards deep extra cover, along the ground
length ball around off, stays back and drops it towards cover
length ball angling away, guides it towards third man

length ball around off, moves across and looks to flick it between the keeper and short fine leg, misses though and is struck on thigh. An appeal for lbw but the impact was way outside off. A direct hit at the bowler's end and Soumya would have been out
short of length outside off, Mushfiqur looks to cut it up and over, misses
a bouncer this time, at the batsman, Mushfiqur swivel-pulls it towards deep-backward square leg
length ball on the pads, tucked away behind square leg
short of length outside off, cuts it towards deep point
length ball on middle and leg, goes for the reverse sweep, doesn't middle it, a quick single to short third man
fuller and wider outside off, smashed along the ground, Rohit dives to his right to save three runs
a full toss outside off, Mushfiqur was trying to create some room, fails to put bat on the dipping ball
another full toss but too wide outside off this time
another reverse sweep from Mushfiqur and once again he fails to beat short third man
short of length and Soumya pulls it towards deep square leg, the ball spins at Chahar who fumbles but recovers in time to keep it to two
slower and wider outside off, goes for the sweep but misses. Pant dislodges the bails but the back foot was always grounded. An easy one for third umpire
short of length on middle and leg, Mushfiqur moves inside the line and pulls it over fine leg for a six
length ball outside off, steers it towards point, straight to the fielder
slower length ball outside off, Mushfiqur stays beside the line and looks to run it down towards third man, gets beaten
another cutter, length around off, Mushfiqur opens the face to work it towards point
length ball outside off, skips down and lofts it towards deep midwicket, not enough power and it falls well short of Rohit at deep midwicket
slower one eventually gets him a wicket. A length ball at the stumps, Soumya looks to steer it behind point but there is no room at all, he misses and the ball clatters into the stumps
slower in the air, length ball at the stumps, backs away and slashes it towards deep extra cover
a flatter one from Chahal, keeps low as well and drifts on to the pads, Mahmudullah flicks it towards square leg

Krunal drops it, straight through his hands at deep midwicket. Was a length ball on the stumps, Mushfiqur went for the slog sweep, Krunal was in the position but it bursts through his hands, bounces once before crossing the boundary
length ball outside off, goes for the reverse sweep but ends up hitting it towards extra cover
fuller and wider outside off, looks to go aerial. Gets it from the bottom of the bat, lands well short and to the left of long-off
length ball outside off, lofts it over extra cover, Pandey at long-off moves to his left, tries to flick it back but fails
slower length ball at the batsman, Mushfiqur moves towards the leg side and guides it towards backward point

another slower ball, looks to flick but misses and the ball drops at the batsman's feet off the thigh. Mushfiqur scampers across and makes it safely as Khaleel is unable to flick it on to the stumps. A late and highly optimistic appeal for lbw, not out
short of length on middle and leg, another cutter, Mushfiqur goes deep in his crease and pulls it behind square leg for four
fuller on the stumps, Mushfiqur was first looking to moves towards the leg side but goes across eventually and scoops it fine, back-to-back fours for him
make that three in a row. A low full toss outside off, and Mushfiqur nails the square drive this time

another one, a lucky one this time. A length ball outside off, Mushfiqur was looking to work it on the leg side, gets a leading edge that runs through the gap between backward point and short third man
length ball around middle and leg, Mahmudullah comes out of his crease, moves across and looks to flick, misses. Pant cannot hit the stumps with the flick
short of length outside off, mistimes the pull towards midwicket, Mushfiqur wants the second, the throw is at the keeper's end but weak. Mahmudullah makes at easily
length ball but down the leg side, given wide and the scores are levelled
short of length this time, skips down and pulls it over deep midwicket, all the way for a six
